reference.title: Table elements
reference.shortdesc: DITA topics support two types of tables. The table element uses the OASIS Exchange Table Model (formerly known as the CALS table model). The simpletable element is structurally less complex than the OASIS table, and is an easier base for specialization.

section.p: The table element based on the OASIS table model provides a wide variety of controls over the display properties of the data and even the table structure itself.

The simpletable element does not provide as much control over formatting. It is useful for describing lists of data with regular headings, such as telephone directory listings, display adapter configuration data, or API properties.
